com.group4inc.wims.idm

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group4inc.wims.idm.Group

  • public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    Group Object.

    This class defines Groups in the context of WIMS.

    Groups are used in WIMS to easily manage multiple User objects. For example, an "overriders" group can be defined for those users who can override steps in the workflow process.

    Author:
    Elliot Linder (eml160)
    See Also:
    User, Domain

      • Group

        public Group(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String initmem)
        Constructor for Group objects. This also instantiates the members ArrayList with a member. An empty roles ArrayList is instantiated.

        name - the name of the Group to be constructed
        initmem - the username of the User to be added to the Group
